titleStmt.title: A Censure of three scandalous pamphlets I. A defense of Dr. Crisp against the charge of Mr. Edwards of Cambridg, by Esquire Edwards in Wales, II. Reflections on the authors of the late Congregational declaration against antinomianism, and trepidantium malleus, by the A. Club, III. A sermon preached Jan. 30. last, by Canon Gilbert in Plimouth with a tedious preface of Mr. J.Y.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by A. Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and tightly bound with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
